Package edu.sru.thangiah.webrouting.controller

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
edu.sru.thangiah.webrouting.controller.UserController
@Controller public class UserController extends Object
Handles the Thymeleaf controls for the pages dealing with Users.
Since:
1/30/2022
Author:
Logan Kirkwood llk1005@sru.edu

    • addUserCarrier

      @RequestMapping("/addusercarrier") public String addUserCarrier(@ModelAttribute("userForm") User userForm, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult, org.springframework.ui.Model model, String carrierName, String scac, boolean ltl, boolean ftl, String pallets, String weight)
      Adds a user with the CARRIER role to the database Creates an instance of a carrier and associates it with the new user.
      Parameters:
      userForm - Information on the user being added
      bindingResult - Ensures the inputs from the user are valid
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      carrierName - Name of the carrier
      scac - SCAC code of the carrier
      ltl - Whether or not LTL is offered by the carrier
      ftl - Whether or not FTL is offered by the carrier
      pallets - Number of pallets a carrier can handle
      weight - Weight a carrier can handle
      Returns:
      redirects to /users or /add/add-user-carrier

    • addUser

      @RequestMapping("/adduser") public String addUser(@Validated User user, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Adds a user to the database. Checks if there are errors in the form If there are no errors, the user is saved in the userService and the user is redirect to /users If there are errors, the user is redirected to the /add/add-user page.
      Parameters:
      user - Information on the uesr being added
      result - Ensures the information given by the user is valid
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      Returns:
      redirects to /users or /add/add-user

    • addUserShipper

      @RequestMapping("/addusershipper") public String addUserShipper(@ModelAttribute("userForm") User userForm, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Recieves user data form the user and validates it Once valid it is saved to the user Repository
      Parameters:
      userForm - holds all of the user data entered by the user
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      session - used to load attributes into the current users HTTP session
      Returns:
      /add/add-user-shipper

    • deleteUser

      @GetMapping("/deleteuser/{id}") public String deleteUser(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Finds a user using the id parameter and if found, redirects user to confirmation page Checks if there are dependencies and if so, user is not deleted and an error message is displayed to the user
      Parameters:
      id - of the user being deleted
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      Returns:
      /delete/deleteuserconfirm" or /users

    • deleteUserConfirm

      @GetMapping("/deleteuserconfirmation/{id}") public String deleteUserConfirm(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Finds a user using the id parameter and if found, deletes the user and redirects to users page
      Parameters:
      id - of the user being deleted
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      Returns:
      redirects to /users

    • showEditForm

      @GetMapping("/edituser/{id}") public String showEditForm(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Finds a user using the id parameter and if found, adds the details of that user to a form and redirects the user to that update form. Also adds the roles, and carriers to the form
      Parameters:
      id - of the user being edited
      model - used to load attributes into the Thymeleaf model
      Returns:
      /update/update-user

    • updateUser

      @PostMapping("/updateuser/{id}") public String updateUser(@PathVariable("id") long id, @Validated User user, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model, boolean nocarrier, boolean resetPassword, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttr, String updateEmail)
      Admin functionality to update a certain users information
      Parameters:
      id - - ID of the user being updated
      user - - Information on the user being updated
      result - - Ensures inputs from the user are valid
      model - - Used to add data to the model
      nocarrier - - Signifies if user is supposed to have a carrier associated with them
      resetPassword - - when checked resets the users password
      redirectAttr - - Used to display messages to the user after being redirected
      updateEmail - - stores the users previous email to allow them to keep the same email
      Returns:
      redirects to users or /update/update-user

    • updateShipperUser

      @PostMapping("/updateshipperuser/{id}") public String updateShipperUser(@PathVariable("id") long id, @Validated User user, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model, boolean nocarrier, boolean resetPassword, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttr, String updateEmail)
      Admin functionality to update a certain users information
      Parameters:
      id - - ID of the user being updated
      user - - Information on the user being updated
      result - - Ensures inputs from the user are valid
      model - - Used to add data to the model
      nocarrier - - Signifies if user is supposed to have a carrier associated with them
      resetPassword - - when checked resets the users password
      redirectAttr - - Used to display messages to the user after being redirected
      updateEmail - - stores the users previous email to allow them to keep the same email
      Returns:
      redirects to /ShipperAdministrationPage or /update/update-shipper-user

    • updateDetails

      @PostMapping("/updatedetails") public String updateDetails(User user, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model, String updateEmail)
      Updates users username, password, and email. Sets role, shipments, carrier, and id to that of the currently logged in user If there are errors, the user is redirected to the home page with an error message displayed If there are no errors, the user is still redirected to the home page but with a message being displayed.
      Parameters:
      user - - Stores information on the user being updated
      result - - Ensures information entered by the user is valid
      model - - Used to add data to the model
      updateEmail - - stores the users previous email to allow them to keep the same email
      Returns:
      /index
